definitions: with little possibility of movement; securely

examples.text: his work is rooted firmly in Chinese culture

definitions: in a way that uses steady power or strength

examples.text: I had her wrist grasped firmly in my hand
stop the bleeding by pressing firmly

shortDefinitions: in way that uses steady power or strength

definitions: with resolute determination and strength of character

examples.text: the council is firmly committed to raising standards in education

shortDefinitions: with resolute determination and strength of character

examples.text: I firmly believe that we could do better

shortDefinitions: having steady but not excessive power or strength
